name: the one where Kelly wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the Web application
scenarioId: classpath:features/veterinarians/view_vet_data:the one where Kelly wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the Web application
methodName: the one where Kelly wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the Web application

testSteps.description: Given Kelly is using the Pet Clinic Web application

children.description: Kelly navigates to the welcome page
Kelly opens the browser at http://localhost:32769

testSteps.description: When she opens the veterinarians page

Then she should see the following veterinarians information
| name | specialities |
| James Carter | [empty] |
| Helen Leary | radiology |
| Linda Douglas | dentistry surgery |
| Rafael Ortega | surgery |
| Henry Stevens | radiology |
| Sharon Jenkins | [empty] |

children.description: For Kelly: Then the displayed veterinarians should contain exactly the information of James Carter, Helen Leary, Linda Douglas, Rafael Ortega, Henry Stevens, Sharon Jenkins

userStory.storyName: The Pet Clinic should allow to view the data of the veterinarians in the system
userStory.displayName: The Pet Clinic should allow to view the data of the veterinarians in the system
userStory.narrative:
As a VetClinic Manager
  I would like to be able to view the data of the veterinarians in the system
  In order to know information about the veterinarians that work in the clinic

  The default veterinarians are:
  | Name           | Specialties           |
  |----------------|-----------------------|
  | James Carter   |                       |
  | Helen Leary    | radiology             |
  | Linda Douglas  | dentistry surgery     |
  | Rafael Ortega  | surgery               |
  | Henry Stevens  | radiology             |
  | Sharon Jenkins |                       |

title: the one where Kelly wants to view the data of all veterinarians using the Web application
